mapper.select: select t.teacid,t.teacname from teacher t left join teacherroles tr on t.teacid=tr.teac_id where t.orgid=#{schoolId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and tr.role_name=#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1
select t.teacid,t.teacname from teacher t where t.orgid=#{schoolId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select t.teacid,t.teacname from teacher t where t.orgid=#{schoolId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.teacid in (SELECT tg.teac_id from teachergrade tg where tg.grade_name=#{gradeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR});
select sub_name from teachersub WHERE teac_id = #{teacid}
